parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Spotify Application Client ID
parameter.description: This is the Client ID provided by Spotify when you add a new Application for OpenHAB/SmartHome to your Spotify Account.

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Spotify Application Client Secret
parameter.description: This is the Client Secret provided by Spotify when you add a new Application for OpenHAB/SmartHome to your Spotify Account.

parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.label: Spotify Client Authorization Refresh Token
parameter.description: This is the refresh token provided by Spotify when you authorize yourself with the Web API and grant the required scope accesses.
